head.title: Baby Lima Beans or Broad Beans with Italian Sausage

ing.item: Baby lima beans or broad beans
Fresh hot red pepper; seeded and chopped

directions.step:
Place the sausage and onion in a heavy casserole or sauce pan and saute until light brown. Add the water and bring to the boil. Add the beans, cumin seed, and hot pepper and bring back to the boil. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes. Season well with salt and pepper. Yield: 4 to 6 servings Recipe By : Nathalie Dupree Cooks a Sunday Night Supper. TVFN, 1996
